about_the_game:
Discover the captivating experience of "Hororo Meguru’s BING!! BALL," a game that takes the familiar fun of pinball to delightful new heights with the addition of Japan's beloved character, Hororo Meguru. Dive into a game that offers both engrossing solo play aimed at achieving high scores and exhilarating multiplayer bouts for up to four players.

【Solo & Multiplayer Modes】

Whether fine-tuning your skills in tranquil solo play or engaging in cheerful competition with friends in the multiplayer arena, Hororo Meguru's allure is sure to enchant you. With vivid graphics and a charming interface, every flipper hit and score milestone becomes a moment to cherish.

【Collect Rewarding Stills】

Advance through the game and complete engaging missions to unlock exclusive reward stills of Hororo Meguru. These treasured images can be viewed in the gallery, allowing you to relive and celebrate your accomplishments at any time.

【Indulge in the BING!! Experience】

The game's unpredictable dynamics and demanding precision make for an addictive and satisfying challenge. Accessible controls mean it's easy to start playing, but mastering the game will test even the most skilled players.
Join us in the whimsical world of "Hororo Meguru’s BING!! BALL" and embark on an exciting journey to smash records, collect stunning stills, and revel in the one-of-a-kind experience. The thrill of BING!! BALL awaits – start your adventure today!
detailed_description:
Discover the captivating experience of "Hororo Meguru’s BING!! BALL," a game that takes the familiar fun of pinball to delightful new heights with the addition of Japan's beloved character, Hororo Meguru. Dive into a game that offers both engrossing solo play aimed at achieving high scores and exhilarating multiplayer bouts for up to four players.

【Solo & Multiplayer Modes】

Whether fine-tuning your skills in tranquil solo play or engaging in cheerful competition with friends in the multiplayer arena, Hororo Meguru's allure is sure to enchant you. With vivid graphics and a charming interface, every flipper hit and score milestone becomes a moment to cherish.

【Collect Rewarding Stills】

Advance through the game and complete engaging missions to unlock exclusive reward stills of Hororo Meguru. These treasured images can be viewed in the gallery, allowing you to relive and celebrate your accomplishments at any time.

【Indulge in the BING!! Experience】

The game's unpredictable dynamics and demanding precision make for an addictive and satisfying challenge. Accessible controls mean it's easy to start playing, but mastering the game will test even the most skilled players.
Join us in the whimsical world of "Hororo Meguru’s BING!! BALL" and embark on an exciting journey to smash records, collect stunning stills, and revel in the one-of-a-kind experience. The thrill of BING!! BALL awaits – start your adventure today!

name: Hororo Meguru's BING!! Ball

subs.option_text: 幌呂めぐるのビンッ！！ボール - $3.99

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8265U 1.60GHz~1.80GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 12th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-12700H 2.30 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

publishers: 幌呂めぐる製作実行委員
short_description: "Hororo Meguru’s BING!! BALL" offers a whimsical take on pinball action. Score big solo, or enjoy chaotic fun in 4-player matches. Collect enchanting Hororo stills as you progress. Easy to pick up for an on-the-go arcade delight!
